FieldDefinition.description: Maximum number of connections in the pool
FieldDefinition.name: maxConnections

Row.sql: select trans.machine_id,loc.location_name,mach.machine_model, trans.daily_count,max(trans.cumulative_count) as CumulativeCount from trans_details as trans,location_details as loc,machine_details as mach where trans.machine_id=mach.machine_id and trans.location_id=loc.location_id and trans.location_id IN(select location_id from location_details where location_name="Koramangala");
select max(daily_count) as espresso from trans_details where trans_details.machine_id='MAC0001' and menu_id='Men001'

select temp.menu_name,((temp.menu_total/temp.count_total)*100) as menu_percentage from (select menu.menu_name, sum(trans.daily_count) as menu_total,(select sum(daily_count) from trans_details where YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(created_time, "%m-%d-%Y"))="2015") as count_total from trans_details as trans,menu_details as menu where YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(trans.created_time, "%m-%d-%Y"))="2015" and trans.menu_id=menu.menu_id group by trans.menu_id) as temp;
select max(daily_count) as Tea from trans_details where trans_details.machine_id='MAC0001' and menu_id='Men003'
select max(daily_count) as Milk from trans_details where trans_details.machine_id='MAC0001' and menu_id='Men004'

select temp.alert_details as Alert_Details,temp.location as Location,sev.error_severity_name as Severity,temp.status as Status, temp.start_time as Start_Time,temp.end_time as End_Time,temp.resolution_time as Resolution_Time,temp.actual_time as Actual_time from (select error.error_severity_id as error_severity_id,error.error_name as alert_details,loc.location_name as location,fail.status as status, CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(hour,TIMESTAMP(STR_TO_DATE(fail.start_time, "%m-%d-%Y %H:%i")),TIMESTAMP(STR_TO_DATE(fail.end_time, "%m-%d-%Y %H:%i"))),':', MOD(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,TIMESTAMP(STR_TO_DATE(fail.start_time, "%m-%d-%Y %H:%i")),TIMESTAMP(STR_TO_DATE(fail.end_time, "%m-%d-%Y %H:%i"))),60)) as actual_time,fail.start_time as start_time,fail.end_time as end_time,error.resolution_time as resolution_time from failure_details as fail,error_list_details as error,location_details as loc where fail.error_id=error.error_id and fail.location_id=loc.location_id) as temp,error_severity_details as sev where temp.error_severity_id= sev.error_severity_id

select "capex" as amount_type,(count(distinct(machine_id))*(select menu_price from menu_details where menu_id="MEN008")) as total from trans_details where YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(created_time, "%m-%d-%Y"))="2015" union select "opex" as amount_type,sum(temp.menu_amt+exp_amt) as total from (select trans.machine_id, sum(trans.daily_count) as menu_total_count,(sum(trans.daily_count)*menu.menu_price) as menu_amt, ((select menu_price from menu_details where menu_id="MEN005")+(select menu_price from menu_details where menu_id="MEN006")+ (select menu_price from menu_details where menu_id="MEN007")) as exp_amt from trans_details as trans,menu_details as menu where YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(trans.created_time, "%m-%d-%Y"))="2015" and trans.menu_id=menu.menu_id group by trans.machine_id) as temp

select sum(temp1.2012) as "2012",sum(temp1.2013) as "2013",sum(temp1.2014) as "2014",sum(temp1.2015) as "2015" from (select temp.menu_id,case when temp.trans_year="2012" then temp.mul_value end as "2012",case when temp.trans_year="2013" then temp.mul_value end as "2013", case when temp.trans_year="2014" then temp.mul_value end as "2014",case when temp.trans_year="2015" then temp.mul_value end as "2015" from(SELECT trans.menu_id,YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(trans.created_time, "%m-%d-%Y")) as trans_year,sum(trans.daily_count) as daily_count,menu.menu_price, (sum(trans.daily_count)*menu.menu_price) as mul_value from trans_details as trans,menu_details as menu where trans.menu_id=menu.menu_id group by trans_year,menu_id) as temp) as temp1;

select temp.error_name,((temp.error_count/temp.error_total)*100) as error_percentage from (select error.error_name,count(fail.error_id) as error_count,(select count(error_id) from failure_details where YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(start_time, "%m-%d-%Y"))="2015") as error_total from failure_details as fail,error_list_details as error where YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(start_time, "%m-%d-%Y"))="2015" and fail.error_id=error.error_id group by fail.error_id) as temp

select heating_time,initialization_time,ideally_esp,pump_lat,dispense_time,milk_cap,grind_cap,grind_lat,flow_meter_parameter,tea_water,ideally_tea,milk_pos_lat, hot_water,milk,milk_pre_cap,esp_flm_pls,lat_flm_pls,ideally_cap,ideally_lat from setting_details,machine_details where setting_details.machine_id='MAC0001' and setting_details.machine_id=machine_details.machine_id

select sum(temp1.Q1) as "Q1",sum(temp1.Q2) as "Q2",sum(temp1.Q3) as "Q3",sum(temp1.Q4) as "Q4" from (select temp.menu_id,case when (temp.trans_month="1" || temp.trans_month="2" || temp.trans_month="3") then temp.mul_value end as "Q1",case when (temp.trans_month="4" || temp.trans_month="5" || temp.trans_month="6") then temp.mul_value end as "Q2",case when (temp.trans_month="7" || temp.trans_month="8" || temp.trans_month="9") then temp.mul_value end as "Q3",case when (temp.trans_month="10" || temp.trans_month="11" || temp.trans_month="12") then temp.mul_value end as "Q4" from(SELECT trans.menu_id,month(STR_TO_DATE(trans.created_time, "%m-%d-%Y")) as trans_month,sum(trans.daily_count) as daily_count,menu.menu_price,(sum(trans.daily_count)*menu.menu_price) as mul_value from trans_details as trans,menu_details as menu where trans.menu_id=menu.menu_id and YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(trans.created_time, "%m-%d-%Y"))="2015" group by trans_month,menu_id) as temp)as temp1;

select ttt.menu_name,((ttt.menu_total_amt/ttt.tot)*100) as exp_percentage from (select tt.menu_name,tt.menu_total_amt,(select sum(ttt.menu_total_amt) from ((select "total" as menu_name,sum(temp.menu_amt) as menu_total_amt from (select menu.menu_id,menu.menu_name, sum(trans.daily_count) as menu_total_count,(sum(trans.daily_count)*menu.menu_price) as menu_amt from trans_details as trans,menu_details as menu where YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(trans.created_time, "%m-%d-%Y"))="2015" and trans.menu_id=menu.menu_id group by trans.menu_id) as temp) union (select menu_name,menu_price from menu_details where menu_id IN("MEN005","MEN006","MEN007"))) as ttt) as tot from ((select "Storgae/Materials" as menu_name,sum(temp.menu_amt) as menu_total_amt from (select menu.menu_id,menu.menu_name, sum(trans.daily_count) as menu_total_count,(sum(trans.daily_count)*menu.menu_price) as menu_amt from trans_details as trans,menu_details as menu where YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(trans.created_time, "%m-%d-%Y"))="2015" and trans.menu_id=menu.menu_id group by trans.menu_id) as temp) union (select menu_name,menu_price from menu_details where menu_id IN("MEN005","MEN006","MEN007"))) as tt) as ttt
select max(daily_count) as Cappuccino from trans_details where trans_details.machine_id='MAC0001' and menu_id='Men002'
